text: :For similarly named places, see Zdechovice (disambiguation). Location of Zdechovice in the Czech Republic Zdechovice is a village in the Pardubice Region of the Czech Republic. It has cca 650 inhabitants. Village Spytovice and two hamlets: Zbraněves and Stará Pila are administrative parts of Zdechovice. ==External links== * Village website (cz) Category:Villages in Pardubice District
title: Zdechovice (Pardubice District)
